tiles.title: Total Parts Made
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize totalpartsmade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2))

tiles.title: Parts Made Chart
tiles.query:
let StartTime = ago(1d);
let StopTime = floor(now(),1d);
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| project messageTimestamp, totalPartsMade

tiles.title: Oil Level
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| project messageTimestamp, oilLevel

tiles.title: Peak Oil Level
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize oillevel = max(round(oilLevel,2))

tiles.title: Lowest Oil Level
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize oillevel = min(round(oilLevel,2))

| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])

tiles.query:

| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])

tiles.title: Downtime
Uptime - Unhealthy state
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Warning'
| summarize downtime = count()
| project strcat(tostring(downtime), " minutes") ;

tiles.title: Uptime - Healthy state
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Healthy'
| summarize downtime = count()
| project strcat(tostring(downtime), " minutes") ;

tiles.title: Availability
tiles.query:
let PlannedProductionTimecalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Healthy'
| count | extend  CommonCol="Dummy" 
| project CommonCol, PlannedProductionTime = Count;
let StoppedProductionTimeCalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Error'
| count | extend  CommonCol="Dummy" 
| project CommonCol, StoppedProductionTime = Count;
let totalRecords  = PlannedProductionTimecalc   
| join StoppedProductionTimeCalc on CommonCol  
| extend Availability = iff(PlannedProductionTime>0,round((PlannedProductionTime -  StoppedProductionTime)*100/PlannedProductionTime),0.00)
| project Availability;  
totalRecords
| project strcat(tostring(Availability), "%") ;

tiles.title: Defective Parts Made
tiles.query:
let StartTime = ago(1d);
let StopTime = floor(now(),1d);
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2))

tiles.title: Quality
tiles.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2))
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)  
|project round(Quality,2)
| project strcat(tostring(Quality), "%") ;

tiles.title: Performance
tiles.query:
let healthcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Healthy'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, healthcount = Count; 
let warningcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Warning'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, warningcount = Count; 
let errorcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Error'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, errorcount = Count; 
healthcalc  
| join warningcalc on CommonCol | join errorcalc on CommonCol  
| project performance = iff((healthcount + warningcount + errorcount)>0,round((healthcount*100/(healthcount + warningcount + errorcount)),2),0.00)
| project strcat(tostring(performance), "%") ;

tiles.title: OEE
tiles.query:
let healthcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Healthy'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, healthcount = Count; 
let errorcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Error'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, errorcount = Count; 
let warningcalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| where machineHealth == 'Warning'
| count |extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, warningcount = Count; 
let qualitycalc = boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine']) 
| where shiftNumber == (['ShiftNumber'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2))
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)  
| extend CommonCol="Dummy"   
| project CommonCol, Quality ;
healthcalc   
| join warningcalc on CommonCol
| join errorcalc on CommonCol
| join qualitycalc on CommonCol
| extend Availability = (healthcount -  errorcount)*100/healthcount  
| extend Performance = iff((healthcount + warningcount + errorcount)>0,round(healthcount*100/(healthcount + warningcount + errorcount),2),0.00)
| extend OEE = (Performance+Quality+Availability)/3
| project strcat(tostring(round(OEE,2)), "%");

dataSource.query:
boltmaker
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| project  PlantName = plantName
| distinct PlantName
| order by PlantName asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| project  ProductionLine = productionLine
| distinct ProductionLine
| order by ProductionLine asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == (['PlantName'])
| where productionLine == (['ProductionLine'])
| where messageTimestamp between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) 
| project  ShiftNumber = shiftNumber
| distinct ShiftNumber
| order by ShiftNumber asc
